movie.description_intro: 2040 is an innovative feature documentary that looks to the future, but is vitally important NOW. Award-winning director Damon Gameau embarks on journey to explore what the future would look like by the year 2040 if we simply embraced the best solutions already available to us to improve our planet and shifted them into the mainstream. Structured as a visual letter to his 4-year-old daughter, Damon blends traditional documentary footage with dramatized sequences and high-end visual effects to create a vision board for his daughter and the planet.
movie.description_full: 2040 is an innovative feature documentary that looks to the future, but is vitally important NOW. Award-winning director Damon Gameau embarks on journey to explore what the future would look like by the year 2040 if we simply embraced the best solutions already available to us to improve our planet and shifted them into the mainstream. Structured as a visual letter to his 4-year-old daughter, Damon blends traditional documentary footage with dramatized sequences and high-end visual effects to create a vision board for his daughter and the planet.

movies.title: David Bowie: The Last Five Years
movies.title_english: David Bowie: The Last Five Years
movies.title_long: David Bowie: The Last Five Years (2017)
movies.summary: A documentary about David Bowie's final two albums "The Next Day" (2013) and "Blackstar" (2016) and Broadway musical "Lazarus".

movies.synopsis: A documentary about David Bowie's final two albums "The Next Day" (2013) and "Blackstar" (2016) and Broadway musical "Lazarus".

movies.title: Within Temptation: Let Us Burn: Elements & Hydra Live in Concert
movies.title_english: Within Temptation: Let Us Burn: Elements & Hydra Live in Concert
movies.title_long: Within Temptation: Let Us Burn: Elements & Hydra Live in Concert (2014)
movies.summary: Features two of the band's greatest arena shows ever - the symphonic 'Elements' concert from 2012 at the Sportpaleis in Antwerp celebrating their 15th anniversary and the final show of the 'Hydra' European tour, recorded at the Heineken Music Hall in May 2014.
movies.description_full: Features two of the band's greatest arena shows ever - the symphonic 'Elements' concert from 2012 at the Sportpaleis in Antwerp celebrating their 15th anniversary and the final show of the 'Hydra' European tour, recorded at the Heineken Music Hall in May 2014.

movies.title: The Monopoly on Violence
movies.summary: Academics opposing the rule of the Government and the ability to make laws and tax. Trying to use a rationale perspective to offer anarchy as acceptable.
movies.description_full: Academics opposing the rule of the Government and the ability to make laws and tax. Trying to use a rationale perspective to offer anarchy as acceptable.
